text: Streptohalobacillus is a genus of bacteria from the family of Bacillaceae with one known species (Streptohalobacillus salinus). Streptohalobacillus salinus has been isolated from soil from the Qaidam Basin in China ==References== Category:Bacillaceae Category:Bacteria genera Category:Monotypic bacteria genera
title: Streptohalobacillus
